name: api-docs
description: Bandwidth's API docs OpenAPI specs, and SDK Generation

scripts.postman: cd ./postman && npm install && npm run start -- -c ./resources/postman_scaffold_collection.json -s ../site/specs-source
scripts.generate: echo 'This Command is temporarily disabled. Please contact Bandwidth's Developer Experience Team for support.'
scripts.start: cd ./site && npm run add-custom-code && npm run start
scripts.build: cd ./site && npm run add-custom-code && npm run build
scripts.serve: cd ./site && npm run add-custom-code && npm run serve

author: Bandwidth
